a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-U-LAL-in lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia TA@v UGU ta-be-e ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a x x x x man-nu u₂-še-ṣi-a {1}x x x {LU₂}E₂.BAR ŠEŠ.UNUG{KI} {1}x+x x x i-sa-ap-raš-šu₂ šu₂-u it-ti-din u₂-se-ṣi-a {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-A-SUM-na ina {URU}BAD₃-ša-{1}ia-GIN šu₂-u {1}ina-qi₂-bi-d.EN-ab-luṭ {1}{d}PA-ha-mat-u-a ina {URU}u₂-bu-li ša {LU₂}pu-qu-di it-tal-ku-u-ni 02-ta UD-MEŠ ina ŠA₃-bi kam-mu-su a-na {LU₂}pu-qu-da-a.a ma-a re-eš {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-MAN-ku-nu {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-MAN-ku-nu iṣ-ṣa i-su-uh-ru it-tal-ku ina x x kam-mu-su i-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a a-ta-a {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ u₂-pa-ah-hu-ru x x x x x ki-ma a-na x x x it-tal-ka ERIM-MEŠ i-pa-ṭar x x x x x i-se-e-a x x x x x x+x ṭe₃-mu x x x x DI-mu a-dan-niš x x EN.NUN-šu₂-nu i-na-ṣu-ru
